greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generalized Catalan numbers C(-3; n).
comment: See triangle A064334 with columns m built from C(-m; n), m >= 0, also for Derrida et al. references.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..850
formula: G.f.: (1+3*x*c(-3*x)/4)/(1-x/4) = 1/(1-x*c(-3*x)) with c(x) g.f. of Catalan numbers A000108.
a(n) = hypergeometric([1-n, n], [-n], -3) for n>0. - _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
program: [a(n) for n in range(24)] # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
(PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, 1, sum(m=0, n-1, (n-m)*binomial(n-1+m, m)*(-3)^m/n)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 30 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 21 2001
